title: Production Insights
login_to_continue: Log in to your account to continue
login_failed_error: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
could_not_load_production_lines_desc_1: There was a problem fetching the data from the server.
could_not_load_production_lines_desc_2: Please check your connection or contact support.
problem_reporting_desc: Track and manage all reported issues from the production lines.
no_problems_found_desc: There are currently no reported problems within the selected date range.
products_desc: Manage your product catalog and their assignments.
no_products_found_desc: There are no products configured in the system yet.
create_new_shift_desc: Fill in the details below to start a new production shift.
fetch_data_error: Could not fetch necessary data. Please try again later.
select_production_line_error: You must select a production line.
shift_created_success_desc: The new shift is now active and can be tracked.
create_shift_unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred while creating the shift.
no_problems_reported: No problems reported for this shift.
sessionExpiredDesc: Your session has expired. Please enter your password to continue.
logoutSuccessDesc: You have been successfully logged out.
sessionRefreshFailedDesc: Could not refresh your session. Please log in again.
loginFailedDesc: Please check your credentials and try again.
cors_error_desc: Could not connect to the server. This may be a network or CORS configuration issue on the server. Check the server logs and console for more details.
